columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource ID.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the container group. This only appears in the response.

columns.name: restart_policy
columns.description: Restart policy for all containers within the container group. Possible values include: 'ContainerGroupRestartPolicyAlways', 'ContainerGroupRestartPolicyOnFailure', 'ContainerGroupRestartPolicyNever'.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: The SKU for a container group. Possible values include: 'ContainerGroupSkuStandard', 'ContainerGroupSkuDedicated'.

columns.name: os_type
columns.description: The operating system type required by the containers in the container group. Possible values include: 'OperatingSystemTypesWindows', 'OperatingSystemTypesLinux'.

columns.name: encryption_properties
columns.description: The encryption settings of container registry.

columns.name: containers
columns.description: The containers within the container group.

columns.name: ip_address
columns.description: The IP address type of the container group.

columns.name: volumes
columns.description: The instance view of the container group. Only valid in response.

columns.name: instance_view
columns.description: The instance view of the container group. Only valid in response.

columns.name: diagnostics
columns.description: The diagnostic information for a container group.

columns.name: subnet_ids
columns.description: The subnet resource IDs for a container group.

columns.name: dns_config
columns.description: The DNS config information for a container group.

columns.name: init_containers
columns.description: The init containers for a container group.

columns.name: image_registry_credentials
columns.description: The image registry credentials by which the container group is created from.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the container group.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
